about_the_game:
Need a little sinister edge in your fantasy game? This pack has got it all with tilesets, characters and music for you to create a wonderful dark fantasy world. With beautiful interior and exterior tiles for creating amazing gothic castles or mansions and characters to populate and fill out your expanding fantasy world! Also includes a windowskin and 5 music tracks to round out your dark fantasy world!

Features:

・Tileset: 15 files
・8 characters come with:
・・Waking sprite & TVD
・・Face image
・・Pictures (Bust-up image)
・・SV animated battlers
・Audio: 5 tracks
・Windowskin x 1
